transcript: to this day has been the scariest thing I've ever done in my life was quitting my job it wasn't just quitting my job it was what quitting my job signified about everything else it meant that everything that I had done at that point I had been building this life that I didn't want to live I was building a life that my dad wanted me to live to get his approval and the thing is when my approval rating for my father was at its absolute highest is when I was my absolute saddest as a human being when I left that job I basically started from scratch and was like what do I want to do once I was able to not care about his opinion no one else's opinion really came even close whoever that person is you care the most about their approval is I think the person that you need to be willing to get disapproval from to do what you want to do
